itunes:subtitle: Ross is back with a new summer anthem "Zima's and Jolly's" as well as medley of hits that he has written with Steel Panther, for Helen Keller Vs Nightwolves, Poolboy and Range 15! This is my thank you to the supporters for listening to the show 2 days a ...
itunes:summary:
Ross is back with a new summer anthem "Zima's and Jolly's" as well as medley of hits that he has written with Steel Panther, for Helen Keller Vs Nightwolves, Poolboy and Range 15! This is my thank you to the supporters for listening to the show 2 days a week! Turn it up.

Follow Ross Patterson on Facebook here:https://www.facebook.com/rosspattersonofficial/

Follow Ross Patterson on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/stjamesstjames/

description:
Ross is back with a new summer anthem "Zima's and Jolly's" as well as medley of hits that he has written with Steel Panther, for Helen Keller Vs Nightwolves, Poolboy and Range 15! This is my thank you to the supporters for listening to the show 2 days a week! Turn it up.

Follow Ross Patterson on Facebook here:https://www.facebook.com/rosspattersonofficial/

Follow Ross Patterson on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/stjamesstjames/
